relation: Darrow3 - #63 Left with the knowledge of an incredibly powerful weapon, Pokey sets out to prepare for the final battle. While he may be a cowardly child at the moment, eventually Pokey will be capable of standing on the battlefield rather than running from it.
Darrow3 - #64 As the story shifts back to the adventure, Ness and friends are left wondering what to do next. Fortunately, convenient telepathic visions clear everything up!

Darrow3 - #65 With a little help from their friends, the party are all set to embark! Remember, if you don't own a vehicle, it's best to friend people who are willing to give you rides. Even if you have to pay off their $1,010,000 debt first.
Darrow3 - #66 Although thought to be defeated, the Clumsy robot is restored along with a new database of friends. Unfortunately for Aloysius, he is not on the list.
Darrow3 - #67 The bus to Threed awaits, but a sudden ringing leaves the plot hanging. And thus, the battle of the geniuses begins.
